thread.title: Comment on Escort claims former UofL staffer paid her to sleep with players by ok-cats-computer
thread.title_full: Comment on Escort claims former UofL staffer paid her to sleep with players by ok-cats-computer

author: ok-cats-computer
title: Comment on Escort claims former UofL staffer paid her to sleep with players by ok-cats-computer
text:
Jason October 2, 2015 at 7:20 pm | Permalink 
Ed, thank you for bringing a sensible comment to this thread. I hope my alma mater UK stomps UofL by 50 in basketball and in football this year. Those will be great days. This news is not worth celebrating though- mostly because of the misguided young women and young men involved. LMAO October 2, 2015 at 7:36 pm | Permalink 
Yeah, its only the LEAD STORY on ESPN…… LOL intheshadow October 2, 2015 at 9:12 pm | Permalink 
Thank you Ed. This is NOT funny or a laughing matter, except to children that do not understand the consequences. We should all hope that there is not an ounce of truth in any of it. For those of you that do not know or understand the word ‘compassion’, you need to look it up. LMAO October 2, 2015 at 9:28 pm | Permalink 
intheshadows, taking up for UL again….. smh. 
THIS IS HILARIOUS. Move along. Please Be True October 2, 2015 at 5:14   
The Communists over at UofL’s State Run Media will try to have you taken off the air now. Guess the players were worried more about getting the D’s up instead of their L’s. Appomattox Troy October 2, 2015 at 5:16   
I don’t like Louisville but, I hope it’s not true. At the end of the day it’s a blight in KY as a whole BigO October 2, 2015 at 5:21 pm | Permalink 
Could not agree more. As much as some don’t like Rick his Jersey hangs in the Rafters at Rupp and is a big part of our history. Fred October 2, 2015 at 5:22 pm | Permalink 
LMAO!!!! Please Be True October 2, 2015 at 5:17   
Yep. I would say Forde is trying to control this story. The Turds will get away with this like everything else. jahanc2uky October 2, 2015 at 5:18   
Who is taking down banners? Please Be True October 2, 2015 at 5:20   
Hopefully Man-Boobs Jurich with his Moe Howard haircut will have to climb up a ladder and take down a banner or two. 
“Destination Job” Historian October 2, 2015 at 5:22   
This shaping up to one of the best stories to ever break out of Louisville or at least since the Sypher episode Please Be True October 2, 2015 at 5:27   
Yes, let us not forget. Ricky convinced a woman to have an abortion (murdered a human life). But it’s okay Ricky. It was only a 15 second mistake. Lol October 2, 2015 at 5:29   
Uofl only gets 4 star kids. This chick must have been bad at her job. Every top recruit that visits uofl ends up at Puke, Kansas or here. Makes me wonder if they are swinging and missing on good players, what are the elite schools doing to get these kids. Uncle B.S. October 2, 2015 at 5:46 pm | Permalink 
Maybe them’s some mofugly hos. catdaddyd October 2, 2015 at 7:15 pm | Permalink 
If you saw her picture, you’d know why they aren’t getting the 5* recruits. Please Be True October 2, 2015 at 5:30   
D’s up. L’s down baby. Troll Slayer October 2, 2015 at 5:32   
Where are all the UofL trolls that live on here at now? Hhahahahahahahalolololololololo Reality October 2, 2015 at 5:49 pm | Permalink 
Could it be that there are no U of L trolls on here? Could it be that homers just accuse someone of being a troll if they something the homer disagrees with? No, never happens! What’s funny is that the homers never have anything good to post about their own program but break records posting when UL is mentioned! Must suck to get your only positives from another program. Troll Slayer October 2, 2015 at 5:51 pm | Permalink 
Found one!!! Rough coupla months for your little program, eh? LMAO!!! RockyMountainWildcat October 2, 2015 at 5:52 pm | Permalink 
Reality- You do realize that you just proved the point about trolls hanging around here, yes? I swear you Cards fans get dumber by the day, the crack and crown royal combo clearly is taking it’s toll. UK Big Board Update October 2, 2015 at 5:52 pm | Permalink 
Cats Paw is back to defend her Tards!! Lol!! PrayIt'sTrue?? October 2, 2015 at 5:40   
Stay classy Drew. If the story is true I’m pretty sure the person cheering and hoping that it did indeed happen is actually a notch below the folks who carried it out. For the record, I’m not too sure a woman who admittedly turned her daughters out can be counted on as reliable. LMAO October 2, 2015 at 5:50 pm | Permalink 
#L1CWhore!!! PrayIt'sTrue?? October 2, 2015 at 6:03 pm | Permalink 
“Well if anyone thinks differently from me (you know the guy who thinks it’s funny if adults pay hookers to sleep with teenagers) he isn’t a UK fan.” Take a hike. LMAO October 2, 2015 at 6:07 pm | Permalink 
Go cry somewhere else. PrayIt'sTrue?? October 2, 2015 at 6:34 pm | Permalink 
Not sure how any of that is crying but I need to stop grappling with swine anyway. LMAO October 2, 2015 at 6:46 pm | Permalink 
Have a nice weekend. #L1CWhore 😉 October 2, 2015 at 5:57   
Apple didn’t fall far from the tree Louisville Integrity October 2, 2015 at 5:58   
Ever find that you have trouble ripping banners down from the rafters after you have been sanction by the NCAA? Ricky Three Stacks here for a new invention that will revolutionize the art of vacating wins and Final Four appearances. Velcro Banners. Velcro Banners are easy to apply, just take off the protective covering, stick to the back of the banner and to the front of the surface to hang the banner, and wallah! You have an easy to remove piece of history in case of NCAA sanctions meaning that Andre McGee, the prostitute loving director of basketball operations self were guilty as sin but Tom Jurich, wink wink, decided you were too good for business. 
No more cherry pickers, no more having to get the janitor to walk the cat walk. Just use the include free pole to grasp the bottom of the banner and gently tug to allow the vacated piece of cheating lore fall to the arena floor. 
Velcro Banners. Get yours today! KT October 2, 2015 at 6:21 pm | Permalink 
lmao. That’s awesome. Track Record October 2, 2015 at 6:00   
Listening to the press conference and Turtleneck Tom just said that Ricky wouldn’t condone this type of thing. AND….that Ricky has a terrific track record. Holy smokes folks! KT October 2, 2015 at 6:24 pm | Permalink 
By “track record” he probably was referring to his taste in classier girls like Ms. Sypher. Oh wait, saw her picture again, never-mind. That’s a ludicrous statement all around. UncleRon October 2, 2015 at 6:06   
I hate to say it, but nothing will come of this… Consider the source. LMAO October 2, 2015 at 6:08 pm | Permalink 
Who? Indiana University? October 2, 2015 at 6:19   
Just watch the recruits pile in now, beotches! leon singleton October 2, 2015 at 6:20   
This is pale to what North Carolina done. WithinReason October 2, 2015 at 6:27   
This is clearly not true. The University of Louisville would never condone such behavior and stands behind its long standing tradition of protecting women and common decency. Kyblue34 October 2, 2015 at 6:28   
Not taking credit for this, but funniest thing I’ve heard is: Louisville First, Chlamydia Forever! Look at this! October 2, 2015 at 6:34   
Sounds like jurich is trying to distance himself from ricky! Patrick_Wren October 2, 2015 at 6:35   
Pitino at news conference: “This just sickens me.” Now he knows how the rest of the world felt during his….15 Seconds of Fame! rushman October 2, 2015 at 6:39   
That is why U of L is called the Dirty Birds. MikeyLikesIt October 2, 2015 at 6:39   
Its times like these I wish there was a live podcast. The jokes for Matt & Drew would be endless. Just Say'n October 2, 2015 at 6:42   
“Rick has a terrific track record”. Boy, these guys have some huge ethical and moral standards they go by! Gary long October 2, 2015 at 6:46   
Didn’t Kentucky’s basketball team and football team get the death penalty I think that’s right LMAO October 2, 2015 at 6:48 pm | Permalink 
Have they had any titles vacated though? lol 😉 Have a nice weekend. CalvaryCatFan October 2, 2015 at 7:37 pm | Permalink 
Sorry. Not the death penalty. Check your facts. CATandMONKEY October 2, 2015 at 7:40 pm | Permalink 
No, neither ever received the ” death penalty “. CATandMONKEY October 2, 2015 at 7:41 pm | Permalink 
In Gary’s defense, ahem, facts ARE optional. October 2, 2015 at 6:58   
They will October 2, 2015 at 7:00 pm | Permalink 
You keep praying buddy. 8 > 2 Xander October 2, 2015 at 7:15   
I hate to say it but I think Louisville is just the tip of the iceberg. I just hope Kentucky doesn’t have anything like this going on. Brian October 2, 2015 at 7:17 pm | Permalink 
C’mon, bro….. CalvaryCatFan October 2, 2015 at 7:40 pm | Permalink 
I believe UK’s players get all they want for free. Coach don’t have to pay for it in Lex. UKALLDAY October 2, 2015 at 9:36   
Those are some cheap hoes, only 10 grand over 4 years and you sell your daughters. This chick defines trash. The Louisville athletic program has a sex problem, I mean when does it end. Petrino, Patino, Mcgee, and all those names that are going to be in the book. Sad thing is I think I’m going to buy that crap just to check it out. mark w October 2, 2015 at 10:05   
L’ville will probably get busted real quick on this one and yet with all the stuff in North Carolina program had going on with fake classes has quietly disappeared from media and they will get off with no punishment. Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
